Courses

For the second half of 2025. Please click the course names for more information.

Name Time Homework Prerequisites
Competition 1 (C1) Tue 14:15–16:15 3–5 hours AU Y8–9
Olympiad 1 (O1) Sun 17:30–19:30 4–6 hours C1 Course
Olympiad 2 (O2) TBD 4–6 hours O1 Course

Every course will run for 20 weeks every week from Tuesday 22 July to Sunday 7 December 2025. In case of a missed lesson due to an emergency, there may be catch-up lessons after 7 December.

Fees

The fees for each course is $1,100 AUD, which comes to $55 AUD per 2-hour lesson. This is payable to

  • Name: Xutong WANG
  • BSB: 013132
  • Number: 164130581
This can be paid in 2 instalments. Please include your child's full name in the reference.

Classes

Each class will have dedicated channels on our Discord Server, and each lesson will be delivered through a dedicated Voice Channel. Please note that all students will be required to have their video cameras on for the duration of the lesson, unless there are exceptional circumstances.

Students may enroll in a class that has already started, but only at specific entry points. Please refer to the class-specific pages for a list of entry points.
